124  WritePage(headerpage);
125  }//end WriteHeaderPage

222  virtual void ResetStatistics(){
223 
224  this->ReadCount = 0;
225  this->WriteCount = 0;
226  }//end ResetStatistics
227 
235  long int GetReadCount(){
236  return this->ReadCount;
237  }//end GetReadCount
238 
247  long int GetWriteCount(){
248  return this->WriteCount;
249  }//end GetWriteCount
250 
255  long int GetAccessCount(){
256  return this->ReadCount + this->WriteCount;
257  }//end GetAccessCount
258 
263  virtual stSize GetMinimumPageSize() = 0;
264 
265  protected:
266 
272  void UpdateReadCounter(unsigned long count = 1){
273  ReadCount += count;
274  }//end UpdateReadCounter
275 
281  void UpdateWriteCounter(unsigned long count = 1){
282  WriteCount += count;
283  }//end UpdateWriteCounter
284 
285  private:
286 
294  long int ReadCount;
295 
303  long int WriteCount;
304 
305 };//end stPageManager
